message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to acquire a unique product that I'm confident you'll find valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident that you won't find a better deal anywhere else.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. However, my budget allows me to pay up to $800000 for such a product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $800000 is your maximum budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $850000. This is a fair price considering the product's value, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
